DOC.brief_summary: The research study difference interval train continuous training among cardiac patient cardiac rehabilitation facility . The main objective : 1 . Functional capacity measure ( VO2 max ) . 2 . Cardiac risk factor 3 . Quality life assessment . Study hypothesis : Interval train effective improve functional capacity , cardiac risk factor quality life , compare continuous training .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Moderate-high Interval Exercise Moderate Continuous Exercise Advanced Cardiac Rehabilitation Program
DOC.criteria: Patients undergone : Myocardial infarction Percutaneous transluminal coronary angioplasty Coronary artery bypass graft Patients : Severe ischemia angina Implantable cardioverterdefibrillator Pacemakers transplant Severe leave ventricular dysfunction Uncontrolled arrhythmia
